alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 9:44PM EST until March 02 at 8:38AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and at Calhoun .Water levels are forecast to crest soon on the Green River. At Paradise, river levels are cresting just above moderate flood stage, while at Calhoun, the crest will be in minor flood. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 25.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CST Sunday was 25.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
